name: fuckyoufriday
text: After waiting 5 years for Onstad to do something with this set-up, I'm beginning to think it's just not gonna happen.

name: luckypyjamas
text:
i like to think that philippe is just being philippe, and teodor uses the opportunity to mess with mr. bear.

who of course is not fooled.

name: mattylite
text: Now it's six.  I'm glad though because nothing could live up to what we are thinking.  At least me.  It is ... it is SCANDALOUS.

name: utv
text: Well, we finally saw closure on Darlene, so it's not impossible. That said, I think the joke is that this strip's so bizarre.

name: catachresis
text: A comment left by catachresis was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by joeyramoney, keithcozz, alejandroadam)

name: jokercross
text: I've always been curious myself.

name: nexus
text: A comment left by nexus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ShemmJacc, Ariamaki, toddtoddtodd, GeyserShitdick, DrSkradley, Tragic_Johnson, Rapid_Roy)

name: tekende
text: A pup is a baby otter.

name: rowboat
text: Nexus don't know shit about what young otters are called!

name: a_dude
text: Baby otters are called "pups" or puppies. Grown up otters use rocks as crude tools to smash open shellfish. I wonder what happend to Philippe.?..

name: jdhenry105
text: He was smashed open by a shellfish.

name: cailetshadow
text: As a pup, Philippe was tragically deprived of sticking his arms into the toilet.

name: saint
text: I'm proud of you for saying this, sir.

name: m3funkyb
text: i think teodor is bullshitting

name: alejandroadam
text: that would make more sense

name: direhaggis
text: Is it just me or does Cornelius' glasses look like a bicycle?

name: dicklaurent
text: ILLEGAL GHOST bicycle.

name: snowman
text: Amazing avatar.

name: direhaggis
text: Tripy.

name: thegoodwillgirl
text:
Oh god.
I chubby you, sir.

name: tetrisattack
text: A comment left by tetrisattack was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Dezufnocosem, Ariamaki, Pie4me6, voxelnaut, SPECTRE, STUART)

name: spectre
text: "How so?" IS the punch line. Cornelius stands there thinking about all the stuff that could happen to a stuffed otter baby, and when he realizes the whole idea is absurd, he calls Teodor on it.

name: tetrisattack
text: A comment left by tetrisattack was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Dezufnocosem, Felion, Ariamaki, rowboat, desdin0va, Tragic_Johnson, anitrophaeron, Lawdog)

name: ggvaidya
text:
Ditto everything you said, except that this one _is_ funny to me. I imagine Teodor and Mr. Bear standing outside the bathroom for hours wondering what it might be, while the little otter keeps at it, whatever 'it' might be.

Now, "Philippe is standing on it", I don't get, but it *is* Achewood #1, and that Counts.

name: semiquaver
text: If you prefer one-strip-one-punchline jokes, PVP is right over there.  Now let us enjoy the early strips for what they are: rough diamonds.

name: snowman
text: Yes!

name: lux
text: The real punchline is that you'd expect Cornelius to ask what happened. Instead, he politely inquires, "How so?" His obviously confused (or suspicious) speech leads to an awkward, humorous situation.

name: em2
text: Look who's being a dick about terms.

name: epicurus
text: This might explain why Philippe does not live with his mom?

name: stuart
text: Arguably, this is where Mr. Bear started to become Cornelius.

name: cracklewater
text:
Could be, he's using words like 'yeah' in the previous strip, even before the tequila has taken hold.
It's a little disturbing.

name: cracklewater
text:
Or not. He's excited at the idea of Flavour Flav visiting in the very next strip, and uses terms like "awesome!"

There is no booze involved; possibly a hangover.

I am further disturbed.

name: stuart
text: cracklewater breaks it down

name: shutup_shutup
text: How so?

name: lawdog
text: We've all seen Philippe's arms.  How the heck can he even reach the water?

name: techiebabe
text: The same way he gives.....Huuugs!

name: sneeepa
text: somehow this strip gets me pretty much everytime and i cannot measure why

name: joeyramoney
text: A comment left by joeyramoney was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Deusoma, Sankster, hellofditties)

name: mollybloom11
text: Phillipe is the only character who really hasn't changed at all over the years... I'm glad.

name: farqussus
text: This has been said about three different characters now.

name: joeyramoney
text: looking at old strips like this is kind of like looking at baby photos. it was all so innocent, so harmless back then.

name: cracklewater
text: You're saying Achewood is so jaded, so harmful in 2008?

name: quartzblade
text: what a terrible misunderstanding

name: ctrl_z
text: "when he was a pup"? Philippe is always 5

name: baryonyx
text: The therapy is for the time his arm got burned by the Big Bang.

name: boopy
text: this strip is my childhood. end of story

name: sparhawk
text: Obviously Phillipe failed to rescue a turd at an age where every victory counts for something.

name: wonglers
text: The jig is up, Teodor.

name: aseidel
text: This is one of the most awkward moments ever on the internet. I love how uncomfortable I feel after reading this strip.

name: woodenteeth
text: What did you do to Philippe you MONSTER !

name: un_malpaso
text:
Can I just say that,
it's amazed me how few have picked up on the Cornelius Bear/Cornelius Elephant connection. (See Babar!)
The glasses are the same.
